export GEM_HOME=/home/someuser/.gem/ruby/2.5.1
export GEM_PATH=/home/someuser/.gem/ruby/2.5.1:/home/someuser/.rubies/ruby-2.5.1/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0
export GEM_ROOT=/home/someuser/.rubies/ruby-2.5.1/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0
export HOME=/home/someuser
export LANG=en_US.UTF-8
export OLDPWD=/foo/bar/baz
export PAGER=less
export PWD=/bar/baz/foo
export RUBYOPT=''
export RUBY_ENGINE=ruby
export RUBY_ROOT=/home/someuser/.rubies/ruby-2.5.1
export RUBY_VERSION=2.5.1
export SHELL=/bin/zsh
export TERM=xterm-256color
export USER=someuser
